title: Trump pressures GOP to end filibuster
shortDescription: Republicans have strongly opposed ending the filibuster despite President Trump's calls to do so to end the government shutdown.

title: Video shows Trump, Melania give candy to trick-or-treaters
shortDescription: Trump and the first lady gave candy to trick-or-treaters in creative costumes on the South Lawn one day before Halloween.

title: Senate GOP rejects Trump call to end filibuster. Live updates
shortDescription: The shutdown pain is intensifying with each day.

title: Trump urges GOP to scrap Senate filibuster to end government shutdown
shortDescription: "Get rid of the Filibuster, and get rid of it, NOW," President Donald Trump wrote on Truth Social on Oct. 30.

title: Trick-or-treaters pay Trump and the White House a visit amid shutdown
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and First Lady Melania Trump hosted a Halloween celebration at the White House.

title: Trump hands out candy at Halloween event
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and First Lady Melania Trump handed out Halloween candy to kids in creative costumes at the White House’s trick-or-treat event.

title: 4 largest airlines call for passage of 'clean' bill to end shutdown
shortDescription: United, Delta, American and Southwest airlines each called on Congress to approve a Republican-backed “clean” funding bill to reopen the government.

title: Trump turned nuclear weapons world upside down in just three hours
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's Asia trip came with significant nuclear weapons ramifications.

title: Trump cuts 2026 US refugee admissions to historic low
shortDescription: The number of refugees allowed into the US will fall to 7,500 from 125,000, under new Trump policy. Most will be White South Africans.

title: Halloween won’t stop Trump’s Chicago crackdown, Noem says
shortDescription: At a briefing on Trump’s Midway Blitz immigration crackdown, Noem said calls for her agents to pause operations through Halloween were "shameful."

title: Pritzker asks Trump, Noem for Halloween immigration enforcement pause
shortDescription: Gov. Pritzker is asking the federal government to give Illinois children and families "a break" and pause federal operations over Halloween weekend.

title: What to know about congressional races in Texas and Tennessee
shortDescription: Two special elections in Texas and Tennessee will see two new House of Representatives members fill seats that were left unexpectedly vacant.

title: Is Trump going to Mar-a-Lago for the Halloween party? What we know
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is headed back to Palm Beach for Halloween weekend, flight restrictions show. The White House did not comment on his plans.

title: Most Americans oppose Trump's East Wing demolition and ballroom: poll
shortDescription: By a 2-to-1 margin, Americans oppose President Trump's East Wing demolition and plans for a 90,000 square-foot ballroom, according to a new poll.

title: Trade deals and nukes: 7 takeaways from Trump's Asia trip
shortDescription: Trump returned from Asia with trade deals with China and South Korea in his pocket but also threatening the resumption of nuclear weapons testing.

title: Trump admin to resume nuclear weapons testing
shortDescription: President Donald Trump directed the Pentagon to restart nuclear tests after decades-long moratorium.

title: Trump cuts China tariffs after meeting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says China will buy U.S. soybeans and curb fentanyl exports after South Korea summit with Xi.

title: Senate under pressure as SNAP set to lapse: Shutdown latest
shortDescription: Congress and state officials are scrambling to continue SNAP benefits despite the shutdown, but the first lapse in food assistance is expected Nov. 1.
